001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model;
002
003import android.graphics.Rect;
004import java.security.SecureRandom;
005
006/**
007 * Represents an enemy object within the game field.
008 */
009public class Enemy {
010
011  private static final int ENEMY_SIZE = 40;
012  private Rect enemyBox;
013  private GameField gameField;
014  private int yPosition;
015  private SecureRandom rng;
016
017  /**
018   * Constructs an enemy object within the game field.
019   *
020   * @param gameField The game field in which the enemy exists.
021   * @param positionY The Y-coordinate position of the enemy.
022   * @param positionX The X-coordinate position of the enemy.
023   */
024  public Enemy(GameField gameField, int positionY, int positionX) {
025    this.gameField = gameField;
026    this.enemyBox = new Rect(positionX - ENEMY_SIZE / 2, positionY - ENEMY_SIZE / 2,
027        positionX + ENEMY_SIZE / 2, positionY + ENEMY_SIZE);
028  }
029
030  /**
031   * @param enemy Implementation details to check if the provided rectangle overlaps with this
032   *              enemy's rectangle.
033   * @return Return true if there is an overlap, false otherwise.
034   */
035  public boolean inside(Rect enemy) {
036    return enemyBox.intersect(enemy);
037  }
038
039//  public Rect position() {
040//    throw new UnsupportedOperationException(); // FIXME: 11/8/23 Do I need more than Y position?
041//  }
042
043//  public void move() { // TODO: 10/24/23 Not sure if it'll move or not.
044//  }
045
046  /**
047   * @return The bounding box (Rect) defining the position and size of this enemy within the game
048   * field.
049   */
050  public Rect getEnemyBox() {
051    return enemyBox;
052  }
053
054//  public void setyPosition(int yPosition) {
055//    this.yPosition = yPosition;
056//  }
057
058}
